passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > form > div:nth-child(5) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(3) > section > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > form > div:nth-child(5) > h2:nth-child(1)
